s2.ptxt: Remove the license plate light assembly while turning it as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Detach the 2 claws and remove the back door outside garnish sub-assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SEAL

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both back door outside garnish seals.

s2.ptxt: Remove the back door outside garnish seal.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR

s2.ptxt: Remove the back door outside garnish protector.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR GARNISH MOULDING PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the back door garnish moulding protector LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR GARNISH MOULDING PROTECTOR RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the back door outside garnish protector LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
